name: KoiFish
0:
”Alexa, open Koi Fish”
”How long does a koi live?”
”How can I transport koi fish?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: koi fish
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Raising a Koi is fun and relaxing. There is a lot to know about Koi. Koi is called Nishikigoi in Japanese. Selecting a Koi is a personal preference. But the price of a Koi can vary by it's breeder, size, variety, body confirmation, color and sex. Like any other animals, Koi also have different varieties.

Koi Fish skill is brought to you by the creators of Koi TV®, Koi.Fish and Nishikigoi.org. You can ask anything about Koi Fish, and we will try to answer those questions! Koi Fish skill is helping the Koi hobby by providing an awareness of Koi. Let us know your feedback. Please contact us at sales@koi.fish. You can also visit www.koi.tv, www.koi.fish or www.nishikigoi.org for knowing more about Koi. 

This skill is developed by DreamPixels, LLC. Please email info@dreampixels.tv or visit www.dreampixels.tv to know more about developing similar skills for you.

For example, Koi Fish skill can answer questions like,

How long does a Koi live?
or
How can I transport koi fish?
or
How many eggs do Nishikigoi lay?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
